original_definition: 'fresh food compartment' means an unfrozen compartment with a target temperature of 4 °C and storage conditions ranging from 0 °C and 8 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
generated_definition: 'fresh food compartment' means a compartment intended for use as a single compartment type that can also meet storage conditions of other compartment types, such as a chill compartment that may also fulfil 0-star requirements.

Article 2: ‘unfrozen compartment’ means a compartment type with a target temperature equal to or above 4 °C; that is a pantry, wine storage, cellar or fresh food compartment with storage conditions and target temperatures, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
‘fresh food compartment’ means an unfrozen compartment with a target temperature of 4 °C and storage conditions ranging from 0 °C and 8 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
Article 10: ‘variable temperature compartment’ means a compartment intended for use as two (or more) alternative compartment types (for example a compartment that can be either a fresh food compartment or freezer compartment) and which is capable of being set by a user to continuously maintain the operating temperature range applicable for each declared compartment type. A compartment intended for use as a single compartment type that can also meet storage conditions of other compartment types (for example a chill compartment that may also fulfil 0-star requirements) is not a variable temperature compartment;
‘refrigerator-freezer’ means a combi appliance that has at least one freezer compartment and at least one fresh food compartment.
‘refrigerator-freezer’ means acombi appliancethat has at least onefreezer compartmentand at least onefresh food compartment.
